|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :;[[TP-LINK Deco X60]] (2-pack)
"1906182X60 Rev1.0sp2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|Proware|List of Wireless Systems}}
==Links of Interest== ;CES2020 *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/15315/tplink-updates-deco-mesh-networking-family-with-wifi-6 ''TP-Link Updates Deco Mesh Networking Family with Wi-Fi 6'' on '''AnandTech''']
==See also== *[[TP-LINK Archer AX90]] - AX6600 Tri-band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router *[[TP-LINK Archer GX90]] - AX6600 Tri-band Wi-Fi Gaming Router :CPU: Quad core @1.5GHz, WLAN: Wi-Fi 6 (574+1201+4804Mbps) :1x 2.5Gbps WAN/LAN, 1x 1Gbps WAN/LAN, 3x 1GbE LAN ports :1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 ports *[[TP-LINK Archer TX3000E]] - AX3000 Wireless PCIe Adapter :Wi-Fi 6, 1024-QAM, HE160, Bluetooth 5.0 *[[TP-LINK RE505X]] - Wi-Fi 6 Range Extender
===Models=== :;[[TP-LINK Deco series]] • [https://www.tp-link.com/en/home-networking/deco/ Deco products] *[[TP-LINK Deco X10]] - AX2700 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco X20]] - AX1800 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco X60]] - AX3000 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco X90]] - AX6600 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco X96]] - AX6600 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System *[[TP-LINK Deco 5G]] - 5G Whole Home Wi-Fi 6 Gateway *[[TP-LINK Deco E3]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco E4R|TP-LINK Deco E4]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco M3]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco M3W]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi Add-On Unit *[[TP-LINK Deco M4R|TP-LINK Deco M4]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco M5]] - AC1300 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus V1|TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus]] - AC2200 Smart Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco P7 v1.x|TP-LINK Deco P7]] - AC1300 + AV600 Whole Home Hybrid Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco P9 v1.x|TP-LINK Deco P9]] - AC1200 + AV1000 Whole Home Hybrid Mesh Wi-Fi System
